PoeTries: I tentativi di Poe 1 Making poetries is the new making code!

PoeTries: I tentativi di Poe Alan Poe 2017-10-07 1 Making poetries is the new making code! This is the first book of poetries here on GitHub written in Markdown. So, please, take a breath from coding, relax and read some poetries. Making poetries is the new making code! You need to be: - essential - versatile - elegant

2 Reflections Shattered mirror reflections seeded down the street along the night. Tall trees branches bare beneath my feet run clouds. And like a flower that opens the night a swatch of sky in a ray of sunshine: a sketch of light melts down the street turns into a shadow, a Flash of elsewhere. And I, who are just a reflection in this nothing copyright, another myself. An image skewed. A pebble thrown among puddles scattered my circulars horizons.
